topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554175656368720c5e940500#post_554175656368720c5e940500
[bq="uc9"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554172d86368726dd4ba0400#post_554172d86368726dd4ba0400
Quick, everyone name their top ten favorite anime.[/bq]
...hell I only have four favorites right now

1. Nichijou
2. Cowboy Bebop
T3. Dragonball Z
T3. Fullmetal Alchemist

And from there, others that I've liked: Squid Girl, Black Lagoon, (*_+some of+_*) the Pokemon anime, what I've seen of Attack on Titan, and very barely Azumanga Daioh

Probably a couple others I've forgotten, please try to remind me guys, I honestly thought I could pull 10 out of my mind :P

topics.body:
Favorite animu?
1. Hellsing Ultimate. This series is literally all of my favorite fucking things ever that aren't porn.
2. Jojo's Bizarre Adventure. Campy as fuck and still goddamn face meltingly awesome. What's not to love?
3. Urusai Yatsura. This is an old one by the same lady that wrote Ranma 1/2 and Inyuasha. It is a funny, high concept slice of life series and sort of a proto harem comedy, though notably while the protagonist does want lust after everything with a vagina in sight, none of them seem to want anything to do with him save for the alien princess he's accidentally engaged to.
